title: My First Post!
author: Admin
body:
This is my first post, written entirely through the web-based CMS interface! It's saved as a Markdown file in my GitHub repository.

Isn't that cool? You can add **bold text**, *italics*, and more.

title: How a Headless CMS Works
author: Tech Writer
body:
A headless CMS separates your content from its presentation. This means you can write content once and display it anywhere:

- On a website
- In a mobile app
- On a digital billboard

The CMS provides a GUI for content creators and an API (or in this case, Git files) for developers.
